content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I asked the AI to browse the Clockify time tracking software website and learned that it offers various features such as timekeeping, timesheets, calendar, auto tracker, reporting, management, invoicing, and expenses. The software has received positive reviews from users and offers 24/7 customer support. Links to other related websites were also provided. I then wrote a summary of Clockify's features and benefits to a file named "clockify_info.txt" and received confirmation that the file was successfully written to.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "eisenhower_box_notes.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command read_file returned: The Eisenhower Box strategy is a productivity tool that helps you prioritize tasks by dividing them into four categories:\n\n1. Urgent and important\n2. Important but not urgent\n3. Urgent but not important\n4. Neither urgent nor important\n\nBy categorizing tasks in this way, you can focus on what's important and avoid wasting time on tasks that are neither urgent nor important.", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "interesting and productive things to do"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://clockify.me/blog/managing-time/productive-things-to-do-when-bored/", "https://www.familysearch.org/en/blog/productive-things-to-do-at-home", "https://www.ntaskmanager.com/blog/productive-things-to-do-when-bored/", "https://toggl.com/blog/50-productive-things-to-do-at-work-when-youre-bored-silly", "https://rize.io/blog/22-productive-things-to-do-when-bored", "https://clickup.com/blog/productive-things-to-do/", "https://www.shinesheets.com/99-productive-things-to-do-when-bored/", "https://juliety.com/productive-things-to-do-at-home"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://clockify.me/blog/managing-time/productive-things-to-do-when-bored/", "question": "What are some interesting and productive things to do?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing a list of over 100 productive things to do when bored, emphasizing the importance of rest and relaxation, and encouraging readers to try new things and improve themselves. It also includes an article on overcoming the planning fallacy and a personal account of following Benjamin Franklin's daily schedule, as well as promoting a free time tracking software called Clockify.\n\nLinks: ['\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n (https://clockify.me/)', '\\n\\t\\t\\t\\t\\t\\t\\tBlog\\n\\t\\t\\t\\t\\t\\t (https://clockify.me/blog/)', 'Tracking time (https://clockify.me/blog/./tracking-time/)', 'Managing time  (https://clockify.me/blog/./managing-time/)', 'Productivity (https://clockify.me/blog/./productivity/)']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "productive_things_to_do.txt", "text": "The website I found provides a list of over 100 productive things to do when bored, emphasizing the importance of rest and relaxation, and encouraging readers to try new things and improve themselves. It also includes an article on overcoming the planning fallacy and a personal account of following Benjamin Franklin\'s daily schedule, as well as promoting a free time tracking software called Clockify."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "productive_things_to_do.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command read_file returned: The website I found provides a list of over 100 productive things to do when bored, emphasizing the importance of rest and relaxation, and encouraging readers to try new things and improve themselves. It also includes an article on overcoming the planning fallacy and a personal account of following Benjamin Franklin's daily schedule, as well as promoting a free time tracking software called Clockify.", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Clockify time tracking software"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://clockify.me/", "https://app.clockify.me/login", "https://clockify.me/time-tracker", "https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/clockify-time-tracker/pmjeegjhjdlccodhacdgbgfagbpmccpe", "https://apps.apple.com/us/app/clockify-time-tracker/id1304431926", "https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=me.clockify.android&hl=en_US&gl=US", "https://www.usepixie.com/blog/track-time-in-pixie-with-clockify-free-time-tracking-software", "https://www.timecamp.com/blog/2021/06/free-clockify-alternatives/"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://clockify.me/", "question": "Can you provide more information about the Clockify time tracking software?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: an advertisement for Clockify, a free time tracking software that allows users to track work hours across projects, manage tasks and projects, and communicate with teams. The software offers various features such as timekeeping, timesheets, calendar, auto tracker, reporting, management, invoicing, and expenses. It works across devices and can be used for boosting productivity, billing clients, managing teams, and streamlining processes. The software has received positive reviews from users and offers 24/7 customer support.\n\nLinks: [' (https://clockify.me/)', '\\n\\n\\n\\nClockify\\nTime and cost tracking\\n\\n\\n (https://clockify.me/)', '\\n\\n\\n\\nPlaky\\nProject and task management\\n\\n\\n (https://plaky.com/)', '\\n\\n\\n\\nPumble\\nTeam communication and collaboration\\n\\n\\n (https://pumble.com/)', ' (https://cake.com/)']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "clockify_info.txt", "text": "Clockify is a free time tracking software that allows users to track work hours across projects, manage tasks and projects, and communicate with teams. The software offers various features such as timekeeping, timesheets, calendar, auto tracker, reporting, management, invoicing, and expenses. It works across devices and can be used for boosting productivity, billing clients, managing teams, and streamlining processes. The software has received positive reviews from users and offers 24/7 customer support."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command list_files returned: ['atlas.yaml', 'atlas.settings.yaml', 'file_logger.txt', 'atlas.json', 'ai_code.py', 'legal_research_resources.txt', 'average.py', 'test_average.py', 'featured_article.txt', '<filename>', 'eisenhower_box_notes.txt', 'productive_things_to_do.txt', 'clockify_info.txt', 'Atlas/executed_code/neural_network_tests.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/print_numbers.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/test_average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/sum_of_naturals.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/factorial.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_script.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_code.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area_calculation.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/generate_password.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/password_generator.py']", type='action_result')]
"""
